meanings.definition: A person who habitually eats to excess.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an overeaters and always has a full plate of food.
meanings.sent2: The overeaters at the party couldn't resist the dessert table.
meanings.sent3: The overeaters in the family always make sure there are plenty of snacks around.
meanings.sent4: The buffet was a magnet for the overeaters, drawing them in with its endless options.
meanings.sent5: The overeaters in the group were known for their love of all-you-can-eat restaurants.

meanings.definition: Those who consume more food than is necessary or healthy.
meanings.sent1: The overeaters in the study tended to have larger portion sizes.
meanings.sent2: Overeaters often struggle with portion control and moderation.
meanings.sent3: The overeaters in the office always had the best snacks.
meanings.sent4: The fridge seemed to call out to the overeaters, tempting them with its contents.
meanings.sent5: The overeaters in the group were always on the lookout for new restaurants to try.
